item.title: Pecos Cleans Up
item.description: Pecos è qui: prega e muori is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Maurizio Lucidi.

item.title: The Handsome, the Ugly, and the Stupid
item.description: Il bello, il brutto, il cretino, internationally known as The Handsome, the Ugly, and the Stupid is a 1967 Italian film directed by Giovanni Grimaldi. It is a spaghetti western parody of The Good, the Bad and the Ugly.

item.title: A Barrel Full of Dollars
item.description: A Barrel Full of Dollars also known as Coffin Full of Dollars is a 1971 Italian Western film directed by Demofilo Fidani and starring Jack Betts.

item.title: My Name Is Pecos
item.description: Due once di piombo is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Maurizio Lucidi.

item.title: Death Rides Along
item.description: Death Rides Along is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Giuseppe Vari.

item.title: One Damned Day at Dawn… Django Meets Sartana!
item.description: One Damned Day at Dawn… Django Meets Sartana! is a 1970 spaghetti western directed by Demofilo Fidani.

item.title: Massacre Time
item.description: Massacre Time is a 1966 Italian Spaghetti Western film starring Franco Nero and George Hilton.

item.title: A Fistful of Death
item.description: A Fistful of Death is a 1971 Italian Western film directed by Demofilo Fidani and starring Klaus Kinski.

item.title: Buckaroo: The Winchester Does Not Forgive
item.description: Buckaroo: The Winchester Does Not Forgive is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Adelchi Bianchi and starring Dean Reed.

item.title: Poker with Pistols
item.description: Poker with Pistols is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Giuseppe Vari.
